page.title: 04NEW ROMNEY RECREATION
page.content: HERE IS SOME INFORMATION FROM AN ACTIVITY GRAPH IN OUR CLASS,IN OUR AREA WE DO MANY DIFFERENT ACTIVITIES. THE MOST POPULAR PROVED TO BE SWIMMING PROBABLY BECAUSE WE LIVE SO NEAR TO THE SEA.OTHER POPULAR RECREATIONS ARE CYCLING,COOKING,JOGGING AND DANCING.WE ALSO ENJOY ATHLETICS,ART AND CRAFT, MUSIC,DARTS,FISHING,SQUASH,JUDO,HORSE RIDING,BALLET,TRAMPOLINING.WE FEEL THERE IS PLENTY TO DO IN OUR AREA. WE INTERVIEWED OUR PARENTS TO FIND OUT WHICH ACTIVITIES THEY LIKED BEST.OUR RESULTS SHOWED THAT THEY ENJOY FISHING THE BEST.THEY ALSO USE SPARE TIME TO ENJOY,WOODWORK,SNOOKER, SEWING,KNITTING.THERE ARE CLUBS FOR W.I.BADMINTON,TENNIS,FOOTBALL,SAILING, KEEP FIT,SQUASH,GOLF,HOCKEY.WE DECIDED THAT MOST OF OUR PARENTS PREFERRED SPORT.
